text: GRP may refer to: ==Biochemistry== * Gastrin-releasing peptide * Grp78, Grp94, Grp170, glucose-regulated proteins * Grape reaction product ==Mathematics== * Grp, the Category of groups ==Technology and materials== * Glass-reinforced- plastic, also known as Fiberglass, or Fibreglass. * Gentoo Reference Platform ==Transport== * Grove Park railway station, London, National Rail station code ==Other uses== * Government resource planning * US Grasslands Reserve Program * Gross rating point * Gross regional product * GRP Records, an American jazz label * Gurupi Airport, in Brazil
title: GRP
